20101208080734.750|20101208080736.000|CCO|
20101208080736.000|20101208080737.250|CCO|       emphysema, or both,
20101208080737.250|20101208080738.500|CCO|   ADVAIR helps significantly
20101208080738.500|20101208080739.750|CCO|     improve lung function.
20101208080739.750|20101208080741.000|CCO| While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101208080741.000|20101208080742.000|CCO|  ADVAIR is different from most
20101208080742.000|20101208080743.000|CCO|     other COPD medications
20101208080743.000|20101208080744.000|CCO|       because it contains
20101208080744.000|20101208080745.000|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101208080745.000|20101208080746.000|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101208080746.000|20101208080747.000|CCO|         bronchodilator,
20101208080747.000|20101208080748.000|CCO|        working together
20101208080748.000|20101208080749.000|CCO|   to help you breathe better.
20101208080749.000|20101208080750.000|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101208080750.000|20101208080751.000|CCO|  inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101208080751.000|20101208080752.429|CCO|        and should not be
20101208080752.429|20101208080753.857|CCO|   used more than twice a day.
20101208080753.857|20101208080755.286|CCO| People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101208080755.286|20101208080756.714|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101208080756.714|20101208080758.143|CCO|          of pneumonia.
20101208080758.143|20101208080759.571|CCO|       ADVAIR may increase
20101208080759.571|20101208080801.000|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101208080801.000|20101208080802.429|CCO|     and some eye problems.
20101208080802.429|20101208080803.857|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101208080803.857|20101208080805.286|CCO|  if you have a heart condition
20101208080805.286|20101208080806.714|CCO|     or high blood pressure
20101208080806.714|20101208080808.143|CCO|      before taking ADVAIR.
